title: AddWordToVocabularyListRequest
description: Request to add a word to a vocabulary list. It's used for all of UI->(background)->(SwiftWebExtensionHandler)->SwiftData

action.description: The action to be performed. Must be 'addWordToVocabularyList'.

word.description: The word to be added to the vocabulary list.

listId.description: The ID of the vocabulary list to which the word will be added.
